parsetree.*:
<root><template><title>RV</title><part><name>type</name>=<value>command

</value></part><part><name index="1"/><value> arma3

</value></part><part><name index="2"/><value>1.38

</value></part><part><name>arg</name>=<value> global
</value></part><part><name>serverExec</name>=<value> server

</value></part><part><name>gr1</name>=<value> Turrets

</value></part><part><name index="3"/><value> Returns id of the [[owner]] of the turret. Server only. Returns 0 on non-server and SP. <br><br>
'''Some info on turrets:''' A vehicle turret will change locality when player gunner gets in it, just like vehicle changes locality when player driver gets in it. Many commands for turrets work only where turret is [[local]]. When gunner leaves turret it is supposed to change locality to the locality of the vehicle. A vehicle can have one [[owner]] while turrets have different [[owner]]s.

</value></part><part><name index="4"/><value> vehicle '''turretOwner''' turretPath

</value></part><part><name>p1</name>=<value> vehicle: [[Object]]

</value></part><part><name>p2</name>=<value> turretPath: [[Array]]

</value></part><part><name index="5"/><value> [[Number]] - [[owner]] id

</value></part><part><name>x1</name>=<value> <code>_ownerId = [[vehicle]] [[player]] [[turretOwner]] [0];</code>

</value></part><part><name index="6"/><value> [[owner]], [[setOwner]], [[turretLocal]], [[setVehicleAmmo]], [[setVehicleAmmoDef]], [[removeWeaponTurret]], [[addWeaponTurret]], [[addMagazineTurret]], [[magazinesTurret]], [[removeMagazinesTurret]], [[removeMagazineTurret]], [[weaponsTurret]], [[currentMagazineDetailTurret]], [[currentMagazineTurret]], [[currentWeaponTurret]], [[selectWeaponTurret]]

</value></part><part><name>mp</name>=<value> Run on server
</value></part></template>
